item.title: Dreadspire (Uppers)
item.description: Menma’s Tera significantly raised the difficulty on top of new mechanics in Patch 2.0 You also don’t restart on Floor 1 if you fail a challenge. This version of Dreadspire has 10 Floors, on each floor you wil fight a single boss. * Each of these bosses are buffed up versions of the same boss weâ€™ve seen before from hard modes/raids/previous DS. The biggest difference is that when your party wipes, you do not just go back in and try again where you left off.
